naslov: Ugljan - villa 5 apartmana na 1094m2 terenu! Pogled more!! (prodaja)
opis: Ugljan Kuća s 5 apartmanskih jedinica površine 340m2 na zemljištu površine 1094 m2! Udaljenost 150m od mora i plaže! Otvoren pogled! Kuća se sastoji od: - 3 jednosobna apartmana, - 2 studio apartmana, - 2 podrumske prostorije, - duple garaže (36m2), - pomoćnog objekta (56m2). Jednosobni apartmani: - kuhinja, blagovaonica i dnevni boravak, - spavaća soba, - kupatilo s toaletom, - velika terasa. Studio apartmani: - kuhinja, blagovaonica i dnevni boravak, - kupatilo s toaletom, - velika terasa. Strateška pozicija otvorenog pogleda na mjesto more, vrlo mirno, okruženo mediteranskim vrtom. Prostrana okućnica ima pomoćni objekt kao i zidani vanjski roštilj. Sve dodatne informacije na upit. Agencijska naknada sukladno Općim uvjetima poslovanja. Cjelokupni kupoprodajni proces vođen od strane našeg ovlaštenog Odvjetničkog tima. OBILAZAK NEKRETNINE 7/7 DANA PO PRETHODNOM DOGOVORU Ugljan A house with 5 apartment units with an area of ​​340m2 on a plot of land of 1094 m2! Distance 150m from the sea and beach! Open view! The house consists of: - 3 one-room apartments, - 2 studio apartments, - 2 basement rooms, - double garage (36m2), - auxiliary building (56m2). One-room apartments: - kitchen, dining room and living room, - bedroom, - bathroom with a toilet, - big terrace. Studio apartments: - kitchen, dining room and living room, - bathroom with a toilet, - big terrace. Strategic position with an open view of the sea, very quiet location, surrounded by a Mediterranean garden. The spacious plot has an auxiliary facility as well as a bricked outdoor grill. Brokerage fee in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions. The entire purchase/sale process is managed by our authorized law office. All additional information upon request. TOUR OF THE PROPERTY 7/7 DAYS BY PREVIOUS AGREEMENT Ugljan Ein Haus mit 5 Wohneinheiten mit einer Fläche von 340m2 auf einem Grundstück von 1094 m2! 150m vom Meer und Strand entfernt! Fernsicht! Das Haus besteht aus: - 3 Einzimmerwohnungen, - 2 Studio-Apartments, - 2 Kellerräume, - Doppelgarage (36m2), - Nebengebäude (56m2). Einzimmerwohnungen: - Küche, Esszimmer und Wohnzimmer, - Schlafzimmer, - Badezimmer mit Toilette, - große Terrasse. Studio-Apartments: - Küche, Esszimmer und Wohnzimmer, - Badezimmer mit Toilette, - große Terrasse. Strategische Lage mit freiem Blick auf das Meer, sehr ruhige Lage, umgeben von einem mediterranen Garten. Das großzügige Grundstück verfügt eine Nebenanlage sowie einen gemauerten Außengrill.
